snippet: U.S. stocks fell sharply on Friday as momentum shares like Netflix and Facebook sold off for a second straight session, putting the Nasdaq on track for its second-worst day of the year.
abstract: United States stocks fall sharply as momentum shares like Netflix and TripAdvisor sell off for second straight session, putting Nasdaq on track for its second-worst day of 2013.
lead_paragraph: U.S. stocks fell sharply on Friday as momentum shares like Netflix and Facebook sold off for a second straight session, putting the Nasdaq on track for its second-worst day of the year.

headline.main: For Second Day in a Row, High-Growth Stocks Drop
headline.print_headline: For Second Day in a Row, High-Growth Stocks Drop
